distri: Looking at the quantity of songs, the analysis of Jazz music can be done since the second part of the 80s. It is interesting to notice that Jazz music is not very hot, as this type of music is known to be appreciated only by a small part of the population contrary to Pop or Rock music which are more popular.
Hottness: The instrumentalness seems to highlight the fact that Jazz music is more about instruments than text. This probably also explains why Jazz music has a smaller public. It is also interesting to notice that the acousticness of Jazz music has not changed a lot for the past 30 years in opposition to most of the other types of music.
